item.title: India GDP Composition 2024 - Pie Chart & Components Breakdown
item.description: India's GDP composition 2024 pie chart showing components breakdown. India's rapidly expanding economy showed strong domestic consumption and increasing investment activity as the fastest-growing major economy.
